findings.rationale: The indefinite duration of confidentiality obligations may lead to difficulties in managing long-term compliance and could hinder future business opportunities.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: The lack of limits on indemnification could expose a party to significant financial risk without any cap on potential liability.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: The absence of a limitation on liability could lead to unlimited financial exposure for either party in case of a dispute.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The automatic assignment of rights to Company A may deter potential collaborators who wish to retain ownership of their contributions.
findings.evidence_quote: The receiving party hereby assigns all right, title, and interest in such work product.

findings.rationale: The provision for recovering attorneys' fees may discourage parties from pursuing legitimate claims due to fear of incurring high legal costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
